name: Shih-Fen Cheng
content: CHENG Shih-Fen | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile CHENG Shih-Fen(On Leave) Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Computer Science; Urban Fellow (Urban Systems) School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of Michigan, 2006 Teaching Topics Computer as Analysis Tool Electives in Intelligent Decision Support Systems Area Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to LIEW Jian Bin TAN Pang Jin +65 68280526 sfcheng@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceLearning & WorkAnalytics & Decision SupportUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentUrban Logistics & Sustainability Strategic Priorities Sustainable Living Driver Guidance System (DGS) Improving taxi fleet efficiency in Singapore
